00026 #ifndef FILETAGS_H
00027 #define FILETAGS_H
00028 
00029 // ED2K search + known.met + .part.met
00030 #define FT_FILENAME         0x01    // <string>
00031 #define FT_FILESIZE         0x02    // <uint32>
00032 #define FT_FILESIZE_HI          0x3A    // <uint32>
00033 #define FT_FILETYPE         0x03    // <string> or <uint32>
00034 #define FT_FILEFORMAT           0x04    // <string>
00035 #define FT_LASTSEENCOMPLETE     0x05    // <uint32>
00036 #define FT_TRANSFERRED          0x08    // <uint32>
00037 #define FT_GAPSTART         0x09    // <uint32>
00038 #define FT_GAPEND           0x0A    // <uint32>
00039 #define FT_PARTFILENAME         0x12    // <string>
00040 #define FT_OLDDLPRIORITY        0x13    // Not used anymore
00041 #define FT_STATUS           0x14    // <uint32>
00042 #define FT_SOURCES          0x15    // <uint32>
00043 #define FT_PERMISSIONS          0x16    // <uint32>
00044 #define FT_OLDULPRIORITY        0x17    // Not used anymore
00045 #define FT_DLPRIORITY           0x18    // Was 13
00046 #define FT_ULPRIORITY           0x19    // Was 17
00047 #define FT_KADLASTPUBLISHKEY        0x20    // <uint32>
00048 #define FT_KADLASTPUBLISHSRC        0x21    // <uint32>
00049 #define FT_FLAGS            0x22    // <uint32>
00050 #define FT_DL_ACTIVE_TIME       0x23    // <uint32>
00051 #define FT_CORRUPTEDPARTS       0x24    // <string>
00052 #define FT_DL_PREVIEW           0x25
00053 #define FT_KADLASTPUBLISHNOTES      0x26    // <uint32> 
00054 #define FT_AICH_HASH            0x27
00055 #define FT_COMPLETE_SOURCES     0x30    // nr. of sources which share a
00056                         // complete version of the
00057                         // associated file (supported
00058                         // by eserver 16.46+) statistic
00059 
00060 #define FT_PUBLISHINFO          0x33    // <uint32>
00061 #define FT_ATTRANSFERRED        0x50    // <uint32>
00062 #define FT_ATREQUESTED          0x51    // <uint32>
00063 #define FT_ATACCEPTED           0x52    // <uint32>
00064 #define FT_CATEGORY         0x53    // <uint32>
00065 #define FT_ATTRANSFERREDHI      0x54    // <uint32>
00066 #define FT_MEDIA_ARTIST         0xD0    // <string>
00067 #define FT_MEDIA_ALBUM          0xD1    // <string>
00068 #define FT_MEDIA_TITLE          0xD2    // <string>
00069 #define FT_MEDIA_LENGTH         0xD3    // <uint32> !!!
00070 #define FT_MEDIA_BITRATE        0xD4    // <uint32>
00071 #define FT_MEDIA_CODEC          0xD5    // <string>
00072 #define FT_FILERATING           0xF7    // <uint8>
00073 
00074 
00075 // Kad search + some unused tags to mirror the ed2k ones.
00076 #define TAG_FILENAME            wxT("\x01") // <string>
00077 #define TAG_FILESIZE            wxT("\x02") // <uint32>
00078 #define TAG_FILESIZE_HI         wxT("\x3A") // <uint32>
00079 #define TAG_FILETYPE            wxT("\x03") // <string>
00080 #define TAG_FILEFORMAT          wxT("\x04") // <string>
00081 #define TAG_COLLECTION          wxT("\x05")
00082 #define TAG_PART_PATH           wxT("\x06") // <string>
00083 #define TAG_PART_HASH           wxT("\x07")
00084 #define TAG_COPIED          wxT("\x08") // <uint32>
00085 #define TAG_GAP_START           wxT("\x09") // <uint32>
00086 #define TAG_GAP_END         wxT("\x0A") // <uint32>
00087 #define TAG_DESCRIPTION         wxT("\x0B") // <string>
00088 #define TAG_PING            wxT("\x0C")
00089 #define TAG_FAIL            wxT("\x0D")
00090 #define TAG_PREFERENCE          wxT("\x0E")
00091 #define TAG_PORT            wxT("\x0F")
00092 #define TAG_IP_ADDRESS          wxT("\x10")
00093 #define TAG_VERSION         wxT("\x11") // <string>
00094 #define TAG_TEMPFILE            wxT("\x12") // <string>
00095 #define TAG_PRIORITY            wxT("\x13") // <uint32>
00096 #define TAG_STATUS          wxT("\x14") // <uint32>
00097 #define TAG_SOURCES         wxT("\x15") // <uint32>
00098 #define TAG_AVAILABILITY        wxT("\x15") // <uint32>
00099 #define TAG_PERMISSIONS         wxT("\x16")
00100 #define TAG_QTIME           wxT("\x16")
00101 #define TAG_PARTS           wxT("\x17")
00102 #define TAG_PUBLISHINFO         wxT("\x33") // <uint32>
00103 #define TAG_MEDIA_ARTIST        wxT("\xD0") // <string>
00104 #define TAG_MEDIA_ALBUM         wxT("\xD1") // <string>
00105 #define TAG_MEDIA_TITLE         wxT("\xD2") // <string>
00106 #define TAG_MEDIA_LENGTH        wxT("\xD3") // <uint32> !!!
00107 #define TAG_MEDIA_BITRATE       wxT("\xD4") // <uint32>
00108 #define TAG_MEDIA_CODEC         wxT("\xD5") // <string>
00109 #define TAG_KADMISCOPTIONS      wxT("\xF2") // <uint8>
00110 #define TAG_ENCRYPTION          wxT("\xF3") // <uint8>
00111 #define TAG_FILERATING          wxT("\xF7") // <uint8>
00112 #define TAG_BUDDYHASH           wxT("\xF8") // <string>
00113 #define TAG_CLIENTLOWID         wxT("\xF9") // <uint32>
00114 #define TAG_SERVERPORT          wxT("\xFA") // <uint16>
00115 #define TAG_SERVERIP            wxT("\xFB") // <uint32>
00116 #define TAG_SOURCEUPORT         wxT("\xFC") // <uint16>
00117 #define TAG_SOURCEPORT          wxT("\xFD") // <uint16>
00118 #define TAG_SOURCEIP            wxT("\xFE") // <uint32>
00119 #define TAG_SOURCETYPE          wxT("\xFF") // <uint8>
00120 
00121 // Media values for FT_FILETYPE
00122 #define ED2KFTSTR_AUDIO         wxT("Audio")    
00123 #define ED2KFTSTR_VIDEO         wxT("Video")    
00124 #define ED2KFTSTR_IMAGE         wxT("Image")    
00125 #define ED2KFTSTR_DOCUMENT      wxT("Doc")  
00126 #define ED2KFTSTR_PROGRAM       wxT("Pro")  
00127 #define ED2KFTSTR_ARCHIVE       wxT("Arc")  // *Mule internal use only
00128 #define ED2KFTSTR_CDIMAGE       wxT("Iso")  // *Mule internal use only
00129 
00130 // Additional media meta data tags from eDonkeyHybrid (note also the uppercase/lowercase)
00131 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_ARTIST        "Artist"    // <string>
00132 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_ALBUM     "Album"     // <string>
00133 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_TITLE     "Title"     // <string>
00134 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_LENGTH        "length"    // <string> !!!
00135 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_BITRATE       "bitrate"   // <uint32>
00136 #define FT_ED2K_MEDIA_CODEC     "codec"     // <string>
00137 
00138 #endif // FILETAGS_H
